Title: Requires the department of health to establish criteria for risk factors of drowning by children in various age groups
Summary: Requires the department of health to establish criteria for risk factors of drowning by children in various age groups and requires the department to conduct an ongoing public awareness and education program on drowning risks, precautions and life-saving procedures.
LawCode: Add ยง2509, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to establishing a child drowning prevention public awareness and education program
